(Program
{+(Other "ambient_declaration"
    (Class
      (Identifier)
      (FieldDecl
        (Identifier)
        (Ty
          (Other "type_reference"
            (Identifier))))))+}
{+(Other "ambient_declaration"
    (Other "ambient_variable"
      (Other "ambient_binding"
        (Identifier)
        (Ty
          (Other "predefined_type")))))+}
{+(Other "ambient_declaration"
    (Other "ambient_function"
      (Identifier)
      (Other "call_signature"
        (Params
          (Other "required_parameter"
            (Identifier)
            (Ty
              (Other "predefined_type"))))
        (Ty
          (Other "predefined_type")))))+}
{+(Other "ambient_declaration"
    (Namespace
      (Identifier)
      (Other "ambient_function"
        (Identifier)
        (Other "call_signature"
          (Params
            (Other "required_parameter"
              (Identifier)
              (Ty
                (Other "predefined_type"))))
          (Ty
            (Other "predefined_type"))))
      (Other "lexical_declaration"
        (VarAssignment
          (Identifier)
          (Ty
            (Other "predefined_type"))))
      (Interface
        (Identifier)
        (Other "property_signature"
          (Identifier)
          (Ty
            (Other "predefined_type"))))
      (Interface
        (Identifier)
        (Other "property_signature"
          (Identifier)
          (Ty
            (Other "predefined_type")))
        (Other "property_signature"
          (Identifier)
          (Ty
            (Other "predefined_type")))
        (Other "property_signature"
          (Identifier)
          (Ty
            (Other "predefined_type"))))))+}
{-(Other "ambient_declaration"
    (Namespace
      (Identifier)))-}
{-(Other "ambient_declaration"
    (Class
      (Identifier)))-}
{-(Other "ambient_declaration"
    (Interface
      (Identifier)))-}
  (Other "ambient_declaration"
    (Class
      (Identifier)
      (Method
        (Identifier)
        (Other "call_signature"
          (Params
            (Other "required_parameter"
              (Identifier)
              (Ty
                (Other "predefined_type"))))))
      (FieldDecl
        (Identifier)
        (Ty
          (Other "predefined_type")))
      (Method
        (Identifier)
        (Other "call_signature"
          (Params)
          (Ty
            (Other "predefined_type"))))))
{-(Other "ambient_declaration"
    (Other "ambient_function"
      (Identifier)
      (Other "call_signature"
        (Params)
        (Ty
          (Other "type_reference"
            (Identifier))))))-})
